name: unsocial
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
happening during the days of the week or hours of the day when most people do not have to work: I don't want to work unsocial hours. Compare
social adjective

Add to word list
Add to word list
used to describe the hours during which most people are not working: Overtime payments help to compensate for low basic pay and unsocial hours.
